    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/813</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aquest any, física!</string>
            <string language="en">This year, Physics!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Jahr, Physik!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette année, physique !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este ano, física!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo anno, fisica!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το έτος, φυσική!</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col·lecció de 15 experiments de física publicats l'any 2005 en commemoració de l'any mundial de la física. Cada experiment es presenta en una fitxa que pot contenir vídeos, imatges, el guió de la pràctica i qüestions amb resposta.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of 15 physics experiments published in 2005 on occasion of the World Year of Physics. Each experiment is presented as an activity card that may include videos, images, instructions, and questions and answers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen elèctric</string>
            <string language="en">electrical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno electrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">electricitat</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
            <string language="es">electricidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">energia</string>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
            <string language="es">energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mecànica (física)</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics (physics)</string>
            <string language="es">mecánica (física)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen òptic</string>
            <string language="en">optical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno óptico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">òptica</string>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
            <string language="es">óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen físic</string>
            <string language="en">physical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung von 15 Physikexperimenten veröffentlichte 2005
bei Gelegenheit des Weltjahres von Physik. Jedes Experiment wird
als Aktivität Karte dargestellt, die videos, Bilder, Anweisungen und 
Fragen und Antworten enthalten kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La collection de 15 expériences de physique a édité en 
2005 occasionnellement de l'année du monde de la physique. 
Chaque expérience est présentée comme carte d'activité qui 
peut inclure des videos, des images, des instructions, et des 
questions et des réponses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A coleção de 15 experiências da física publicou em 
2005 na ocasião do ano do mundo da física. Cada experiência 
é apresentada como um cartão da atividade que possa incluir videos, 
imagens, instruções, e perguntas e respostas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'accumulazione di 15 esperimenti di fisica ha pubblicato
in 2005 occasionalmente dell'anno del mondo della fisica. Ogni 
esperimento è presentato come scheda di attività che può includere 
i videos, immagini, istruzioni e domande e risposte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή 15 πειραμάτων φυσικής που δημοσιεύονται το 
2005 στην περίπτωση του παγκόσμιου έτους φυσικής. Κάθε 
πείραμα παρουσιάζεται ως κάρτα δραστηριότητας που μπορεί να 
περιλάβει τα βίντεο, τις εικόνες, τις οδηγίες, και τις 
ερωταποκρίσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
